text: ns that make having a heart attack more likely. - If you have high blood cholesterol, follow your doctor's advice about lowering it. Take medications to lower your cholesterol as directed if diet and exercise aren't enough.   -  If you have high blood pressure, follow your doctor's advice about keeping it under control. Take blood pressure medications as directed.   - If you have diabetes, sometimes called high blood sugar, try to control your blood sugar level through diet and physical activity
